about.title: Who We Are
about.lead_text: We are a charitable educational initiative established in 2020, aimed at helping students who need special education but lack the resources, by recruiting university students or graduates to carry out this mission. The initiative provides a remote learning environment to support all grade levels and subjects, in addition to foundational education for those in need. Education is delivered online using applications like Zoom and Teams, where sessions are live, recorded by volunteers, and reviewed by specialists to ensure the success of the educational process.
